report.title: But It's Been Months
report.author: Me
report.bodytext: I just tested positive for trace amounts of opiates, which I have not taken for at least a few months. However, for 4-5 days before the test I had 60mg/d DXM (dextromethorphan). I suspect this to be the culprit, otherwise I had only consumed some phenethylamines and 2cb.
